Uses of Package
org.drip.simm20.margin

  • Packages that use org.drip.simm20.margin 
    Package Description
    org.drip.simm20.margin
    ISDA SIMM 2.0 Risk Factor Margin Metrics
    org.drip.simm20.product
    ISDA SIMM 2.0 Risk Factor Sensitivities
  • Classes in org.drip.simm20.margin used by org.drip.simm20.margin 
    Class and Description
    BucketAggregate
    BucketAggregate holds the Single Bucket Sensitivity Margin, the Cumulative Bucket Risk Factor Sensitivity Margin, as well as the Aggregate Risk Factor Maps.
    BucketAggregateIR
    BucketAggregateIR holds the Single Bucket IR Sensitivity Margin, the Cumulative Bucket Risk Factor Sensitivity Margin, as well as the IR Aggregate Risk Factor Maps.
    IRDeltaAggregate
    IRDeltaAggregate holds the IM Delta Margin Co-variances within a single Currency for each of the IR Risk Factors - OIS, LIBOR 1M, LIBOR 3M, LIBOR 6M LIBOR 12M, PRIME, and MUNICIPAL.
    IRFactorAggregate
    IRFactorAggregate holds the Weighted Net Sensitivity Aggregates for each of the IR Risk Factors - OIS, LIBOR 1M, LIBOR 3M, LIBOR 6M LIBOR 12M, PRIME, and MUNICIPAL.
    RiskFactorAggregate
    RiskFactorAggregate holds the Weighted and Normalized Bucket Risk Factor Sensitivity along with the Normalization Factors.
    RiskFactorAggregateIR
    RiskFactorAggregateIR holds the Sensitivity Margin Aggregates for each of the IR Risk Factors - OIS, LIBOR 1M, LIBOR 3M, LIBOR 6M LIBOR 12M, PRIME, and MUNICIPAL.
  • Classes in org.drip.simm20.margin used by org.drip.simm20.product 
    Class and Description
    BucketAggregate
    BucketAggregate holds the Single Bucket Sensitivity Margin, the Cumulative Bucket Risk Factor Sensitivity Margin, as well as the Aggregate Risk Factor Maps.
    IRFactorAggregate
    IRFactorAggregate holds the Weighted Net Sensitivity Aggregates for each of the IR Risk Factors - OIS, LIBOR 1M, LIBOR 3M, LIBOR 6M LIBOR 12M, PRIME, and MUNICIPAL.
    RiskClassAggregate
    RiskClassAggregate holds the Bucket Aggregate and the Computed SIMM Margin for a single Risk Class.
